name: Electromagnetism
description:
*This is a game made in RPGMaker VX ACE and can only be playable on PC.*

WARNING: Dark, Blood, Jumpscare/Chase sequence

FREE TO PLAY!

'' Electromagnetism '' is an IDENTITY V short fangame dedicate to the ship of 
Norton Campbell/Prospector & Luca Balsa/''Prisoner''.
The story follows Norton trying to find Luca in the Oletus manor.

Can't play? Here's a full complete walkthrough!
